item.title: 欧元就业竞赛为希腊提供了象征性复兴的机会
item.description: 希腊财政部长竞聘管理希腊债务危机曾经爆发的同一论坛，希腊即将面临欧元区复兴道路上最具象征意义的考验。【原文：Greece is about to face the most symbolic test yet on its road to euro-area rehabilitation as its finance minister bids to run the same forum where the country’s debt crisis once played out.】

item.title: 英国 Nu Quantum 公司融资 6000 万美元，国家电网领投
item.description: Nu Quantum 是一家英国初创公司，致力于构建连接和扩展量子计算机的网络基础设施，该公司在英国最大的 A 轮融资中筹集了 6000 万美元，投资者押注于前沿技术的发展。【原文：Nu Quantum, a British startup that builds networking infrastructure to link and scale quantum computers, raised $60 million in one of the largest Series A rounds raised in the UK, as investors bet on advances in the frontier technology.】

item.title: 亚马逊将印度投资承诺提高至 2030 年 350 亿美元
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）承诺在未来五年内向印度投资 350 亿美元，增加在这一重要增长市场的支出，以拓展从快速商务到云计算的业务。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. pledged to invest $35 billion in India over the next five years, boosting its spending in the key growth market to expand in businesses from quick commerce to cloud computing.】

item.title: 中国铁矿石巨头称投机使价格过热
item.description: 国家支持的贸易商中国矿产资源集团有限公司（China Mineral Resources Group Co.【原文：Iron ore risks becoming detached from physical market reality, as financial speculation drives strong prices more so than underlying supply and demand, according to state-backed trader China Mineral Resources Group Co.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行转向鹰派，澳大利亚顶尖经济学家对利率看法不一
item.description: 由于澳大利亚储备银行行长米歇尔-布洛克（Michele Bullock）出人意料地转向鹰派，促使投资者加大了对澳大利亚储备银行最早将于二月份加息的押注，澳大利亚的两位顶级经济学家在储备银行的下一步利率行动问题上发现自己处于不同的阵营。【原文：Two of Australia’s top economists find themselves in different camps over the Reserve Bank’s next interest-rate move as Governor Michele Bullock’s surprise hawkish shift prompted investors to boost bets on a hike as early as February.】

item.title: 海洋城私人信贷基金因财富增长而达到 9 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，新加坡淡马锡控股私人有限公司（Temasek Holdings Pte.）旗下的 SeaTown Holdings International 已从星展集团控股有限公司（DBS Group Holdings Ltd.）的私人银行客户那里为其第三支私人信贷基金筹集了约 1.8 亿美元资金。【原文：SeaTown Holdings International, a unit of Singapore’s Temasek Holdings Pte., has raised around $180 million from DBS Group Holdings Ltd.’s private bank clients for its third private credit fund, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 在一连串轰动一时的科技 IPO 之后，Meesho 的上市将考验印度投资者的胃口
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 剑网将以 35 亿港元收购香港建行大厦股权
item.description: 中国电子商务巨头 JD.com Inc. 旗下公司已同意以 35 亿港元（4.5 亿美元）的价格从丽新发展有限公司（Lai Sun Development Co.【原文：A unit of Chinese e-commerce giant JD.com Inc. has agreed to purchase a 50% stake in Hong Kong’s CCB Tower for HK$3.5 billion ($450 million) from Lai Sun Development Co.】

item.title: 印度交易创纪录，Meesho 首次公开募股 6.03 亿美元后首次亮相
item.description: 印度电子商务平台 Meesho Ltd. 将于本周三在孟买首次公开募股，在一连串大手笔的科技股首次公开募股之后，这次上市将衡量投资者的胃口，备受关注。【原文：Meesho Ltd., an Indian e-commerce platform, is set to debut in Mumbai on Wednesday in a closely watched listing that will gauge investor appetite after a string of blockbuster tech IPOs.】

item.title: Edelweiss 发掘印度小镇，争夺新财富
item.description: Edelweiss 资产管理有限公司计划将其业务扩展到印度的 100 个城市，以迎合散户投资者对印度股市的兴趣。【原文：Edelweiss Asset Management Ltd. plans to expand its presence to 100 cities across India as it seeks to tap into a wave of interest among retail investors in the country’s stock market.】

item.title: 特朗普提出对拜登的美联储提名人选进行自动调查
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统暗示，如果乔-拜登总统任命的美联储理事的委托书被自动签署，他可能会寻求将其赶下台，这是他对中央银行施加控制的最新尝试。【原文：President Donald Trump suggested he could seek to oust Federal Reserve governors appointed by President Joe Biden if their commissions were signed by autopen, in his latest bid to exert control over the central bank.】

item.title: 中国消费通胀率升至一年多来最快水平
item.description: 11 月份，中国居民消费价格涨幅略有回升，这进一步表明，尽管成本下行压力依然普遍存在，但通货紧缩正在缓解。【原文：China’s consumer price growth edged up in November, in a further sign that deflation is easing even as downward pressures on costs remain widespread.】

item.title: 巴基斯坦将进行多达 16 次首次公开募股，三年来股票涨幅超过 300
item.description: 巴基斯坦股市大涨，散户参与度飙升，吸引企业重返股票市场，银行家们认为，这将是 2026 年首次公开募股的辉煌一年。【原文：Pakistan’s blistering stock rally and surging retail participation are drawing companies back to the equity market, setting up what bankers say could be a banner year for initial public offerings in 2026.】

item.title: 美联储终结宽松收益率，收入大挤压拉开序幕
item.description: 对于收益投资者来说，轻松获得回报的日子正在消失。【原文：For income investors, the days of easy returns are vanishing.】

item.title: 基础设施服务公司卡迪纳尔 IPO 获得 2.415 亿美元融资
item.description: 卡迪纳尔基础设施集团公司是一家基础设施服务公司，在首次公开募股中筹集了 2.415 亿美元，股票定价为市场区间的中点。【原文：Cardinal Infrastructure Group Inc., an infrastructure services firm, raised $241.5 million in an initial public offering, pricing its shares at the midpoint of a marketed range.】

item.title: Airbnb 首席信息官在首席技术官离职后离职
item.description: Airbnb 公司的首席信息官即将离职，这是这家房屋租赁公司最近几周发生的最新技术领导层变动，因为该公司准备在明年推出更多人工智能应用程序更新。【原文：Airbnb Inc.’s chief information officer is leaving, the latest technical leadership change at the home-rental company in recent weeks as it prepares to roll out more artificial intelligence app updates next year.】

item.title: 债权人会议开幕，中国万科力争避免违约
item.description: 中国万科公司债权人将于周三举行会议，这家陷入困境的开发商将再接再厉，为旨在避免违约的债券延期计划赢得支持。【原文：China Vanke Co. creditors are set to meet Wednesday as the distressed developer makes one more push to win support for a bond extension plan aimed at averting a default.】

item.title: 美联储本周降息可能是一段时间内最后一次
item.description: 美联储官员已准备好在周三连续第三次降息，但连降可能就此结束。【原文：Federal Reserve officials are primed to deliver a third consecutive interest-rate cut on Wednesday, but the streak may end there.】

item.title: 澳大利亚青少年禁令开始实施，另类社交媒体应用激增
item.description: 由于澳大利亚对 16 岁以下儿童实施了具有里程碑意义的禁令，儿童开始使用不受限制的应用程序，替代性社交媒体平台周三在澳大利亚大受欢迎。【原文：Alternative social media platforms have surged in popularity in Australia Wednesday, as the nation’s landmark ban for under-16s drives children to non-restricted apps.】

item.title: 人工智能内存芯片制造商 SK 海力士考虑在纽约上市
item.description: SK 海力士公司正在探讨在纽约上市的可能性，此举可能有助于缩小这家韩国芯片制造商与美光科技公司等美国同行之间的估值差距。【原文：SK Hynix Inc. is exploring the possibility of listing shares in New York, a move seen potentially helping close the valuation gap between the South Korean chipmaker and US peers including Micron Technology Inc.】

item.title: 石油连跌两天后企稳，供应过剩担忧凸显
item.description: 由于对全球供应过剩的担忧继续打压市场情绪，石油创下一个月以来的最大两日跌幅。【原文：Oil held the biggest two-day drop in a month as concerns about global oversupply continued to weigh on sentiment.】

item.title: 白银因降息希望和供应紧张而扩大涨幅，突破 60 美元
item.description: 白银在周二首次突破每盎司 60 美元后延续涨势，交易商押注美联储将进一步放宽货币政策，供应将继续紧缩。【原文：Silver extended gains after breaking above $60 an ounce for the first time on Tuesday, with traders betting on further monetary easing by the Federal Reserve and continued supply tightness.】

item.title: 中美人工智能竞争中心的英伟达芯片指南
item.description: 在中国奋力追赶美国人工智能技术之际，硅谷英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）生产的哪些芯片可以运给中国客户，就可以衡量两国关系的状况。【原文：As China races to catch up with the US in artificial intelligence technology, the state of relations between the countries can be gauged by looking at which of the chips made by Silicon Valley’s Nvidia Corp. can be shipped to Chinese customers.】

item.title: 印度小盘股跌跌不休，零售交易商倍感压力
item.description: 印度的小盘股大幅落后于大盘股，对主导该板块交易的散户投资者造成了打击。【原文：India’s small-cap stocks are sharply trailing their larger peers, dealing a blow to retail investors who dominate trading in the segment.】

item.title: 日本股价飙升引发拆股浪潮
item.description: 日本股市今年创下了一个又一个纪录，但个人投资者却很难加入这场狂欢。【原文：Japan’s stock market has notched up record after record this year, but individual investors are having a harder time joining the party.】

item.title: 腾讯出手重塑百亿美元全球游戏帝国
item.description: 今年，腾讯控股有限公司（Tencent Holdings Ltd. ）的游戏业务凭借僵尸恐怖游戏《致命光线》（Dying Light：The Beast.【原文：This year, Tencent Holdings Ltd.’s gaming business scored record sales, defying an industry slowdown with international hits like zombie horror Dying Light: The Beast.】

item.title: 本-布莱克的发展机构有望获得 1400 亿美元的资金支持
item.description: 国际开发金融公司是一个在特朗普政府外交政策中扮演着越来越重要角色的政府机构，根据国会的一项新提案，该机构的融资能力将增加两倍多。【原文：The International Development Finance Corp., a government agency that’s taken on a growing role in the Trump administration’s foreign policy, stands to see its financing capacity more than triple under a new proposal in Congress.】

item.title: 特朗普称已 "想好 "美联储主席人选
item.description: 据《金融时报》报道，唐纳德-特朗普总统将于本周开始面试美联储主席的几位候选人。【原文：President Donald Trump said he will be looking at a couple candidates to chair the Federal Reserve, after the Financial Times reported that he would begin interviews with contenders this week.】

item.title: 政治局支持流动性，中国收益率曲线有望趋缓
item.description: 在中国最高领导人表示将适度宽松的货币政策作为明年经济工作的重中之重之后，中国的主权收益率曲线似乎将延续近期的陡峭走势。【原文：China’s sovereign yield curve looks set to extend a recent steepening after the nation’s top leaders signaled a moderately loose monetary stance with their top economic priorities for next year.】
